general.gigTitle: design and develop professional ghost platform website, content publisher

sellerCard.description:
As a web designer and developer with six years of experience, I have a proven track record of creating stunning and functional websites for a variety of clients. My skills and expertise in HTML, Java, Figma, and WordPress, combined with my specialization in graphics, have allowed me to deliver high-quality projects that exceed client expectations.

In addition, I have extensive experience using Figma to create visually appealing designs and WordPress to build dynamic, content-rich websites. My specialization in graphics allows me to create custom logos, icons, and other visual elements

description.content:
Ghost is a powerful app for new-media creators to publish, share, and grow a business around their content. It comes with modern tools to build a website, publish content, send newsletters & offer paid subscriptions to members.


I am codepanda the professional website designer and developer for you on fiverr!


I will design and develop a professional, branded ghost website for your business in the most growing way! in this gig I will offer something you will never regret.


A product you can depend on.


Customize fonts, colors, and layouts with just a few clicks. Best of all, modern, responsive themes look great on all devices.

My Services : 


  • Full ghost web design and develop
  • Redesign Current Website
  • Store Front Designs 
  • Sales Page Designs 
  • Theme Editing


With :


  • Satisfaction Guarantee 
  • Money back Guarantee 
  • Fast Delivery 


You need to provide:


your paid ghost account logins (this package doesn't includes fees for the hosting and domain, I am only designing and developing) 


Please contact me before ordering, We can have a clear eye about your project and I can guide you to choose the correct package. Contact Me to Wordpress,Wix or any Web projects, Landing pages


Thank you!!

openGraph.title: design and develop professional ghost platform website, content publisher

reviews.comment:
My experience with CodePanda was very frustrating. When we began the project, they gave me advice on the project and were helpful. We decided to build the site on Wordpress rather than Ghost based on their recommendations. But when we began building it, it was a completely different story.

First of all, they said the project was finished when it clearly wasn't. None of the site was built when they marked the project as done. I messaged the team to extend the delivery date, but they didn't do it. 

I had to threaten them 2-3 times that I would file a dispute with Fiverr for them to start building the site. Even then, the communication was horrible. They would tell me something would take 1-2 hours and I would wait for days with no response. They would just ignore me. Or make up an excuse of some sort. 

Overall, my experience was frustrating. And honestly a waste of time. I tried to give the CodePanda team plenty of opportunities to redeem themselves. but it just wasted more time. Unfortunately now I have to go back and do things the right way.

seller_response.comment:
Thank you for sharing your feedback. We apologize for any frustration you experienced during the project. We understand that clear communication and timely delivery are crucial, and we regret any inconvenience caused.

Initially, you requested a redesign of a Ghost website, but then decided on a complete WordPress site, which we accommodated. Despite the challenges, we did complete the WordPress website as per your final request.

We are committed to your satisfaction and are more than willing to address any outstanding issues. Please send us a revision request here, and we will gladly extend the necessary changes.

Thank you for your patience and understanding.

Best regards,
The CodePanda

reviews.comment: CodePanda communicated well but I paid 3 times what the usual highest rate is for a custom site. I got a home page and detailed page that I requested but the site is incomplete and Im having to go back and do the majority of the site myself. What I got for the money just wasnt good.

seller_response.comment: Hi, I thought We are completed there. I really love to help you with other changes you need.

reviews.comment: Receptive and easy to work with.

seller_response.comment: Excellent client to work with! appreciate for choosing me.
